title: Desert Rose
description: In an instant, Jennifer’s life is forever altered.When her ten-year-old daughter, Sarah, is abducted in Dubai, expats Jennifer and her husband Kevin are thrown into an unimaginable nightmare. With very little help provided by the local authorities and the US Embassy, Jennifer watches her life erode away and the tension in her marriage increase. Driven by rage and desperation, she is forced to make decisions she never thought possible.An investigation without answers. A cover-up. A conspiracy. A betrayal.There is no turning back.What would you do if your child was taken?Desert Rose was named ‘Most Promising Manuscript’ at the 2018 Alaskan Writers Guild Conference.
author: K.  Moore
